review: This wasn't as easy to install as advertised. Did not work well at all with TV in a partially enclosed cabinet . Had to move it to a completely open TV. Also, in using Netflix there are many times during a program  when there are pauses as it is  loading the image. Pandora works just fine. Still learning the other apps. The screen saver pictures are gorgeous.Netflix works better with another type of receiver
author: Donald Williams

review: Loving it! Have a Sony smart TV that we have had nothing bit issues with when streaming. This was easy to set up and works great!
author: Amanda Rambur

review: Remote control is extremely difficult to get open. Hoping the batteries last a long time because I had to wait for my husband to get home to open it .
author: Nancy Berg

review: This is so cool, I love it.  Very easy to use as well.
author: Karen Nickell

review: Good interface - better than Chromecast.Seems to have more buffer than Chromecast.Good content - although I want more (because of where I live - way out in the boonies, this is the only TV content I can get).However, I am getting the intermittent (and all too common for Firestick users) "HDCP unauthorised. Content disabled." error when I try to play content.It happens with Amazon Prime, Hulu and Netflix.I removed the HDMI extension, I plug it into a different HDMI port on the TV, I unplug the power and let it sit for a while. I turn the TV off and then back on again.Sometimes it works for weeks without this problem, sometimes it works for a few movies and then it stops working again, sometimes it works for a few days or a week before it happens again.This is VERY annoying.When are you guys going to fix this??
author: Lauren C. Bish "LCB"

review: So far it is working great, simple to hook up and operate.
author: Carl J.

review: We ordered Fire Stick not really knowing what we needed. Directions were perfect, set-up was easy and we started watching shows right away. Could not have asked for a better experience!
author: Elizabeth A. Durr

review: Although we have only had the Fire TV Stick a short while, we have truly enjoyed it. It was extremely easy to set up. Previously, we were streaming Amazon Prime Video from my MacBook or iPad through our Apple TV, it is much better to have a direct connection. The price is right for all it offers.
author: Joan T.
